text: Trygve Magnus Slagsvold Vedum (born 1 December 1978) is a Norwegian politician. He is a member of the Centre Party. In 2021, he became a minister in the Cabinet of prime minister St√∏re as Minister of Finance. He is an MP for Hedmark since 2005. He was leader of the Centre Party since 2014. ==References== Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian politicians
title: Trygve Slagsvold Vedum
